tags.name: Clicks RTB
tags.description: To get click listings from Insurance.io. Authentication is bearer auth-based, and Bearer token will be provided by the dev team.

Brand.description: Customer ID assigned by the service provider
Customer ID assigned by the service provider
Customer ID assigned by the service provider
Customer ID assigned by the service provider
Customer ID assigned by the service provider
Customer ID assigned by the service provider

post.description:
This document provides technical details required to integrate with SmartFinancial's real time clicks platform. SmartFinancial uses an auction model to bid in auctions for clicks and accepts JSON data at an HTTPS endpoint. 

 Authentication is bearer auth-based, and Bearer token will be provided by SmartFinancial dev team.

This document provides technical details required to integrate with SmartFinancial's real time clicks platform. SmartFinancial uses an auction model to bid in auctions for clicks and accepts JSON data at an HTTPS endpoint. 

 Authentication is bearer auth-based, and Bearer token will be provided by SmartFinancial dev team.

position.description: Integer value based on the actual position of the ad

post.description: API to get price presentation listing for the advertiser. We call this API before returning any listings for the advertiser

get.description: API to get pre-filled version of the redirect URL for the advertiser. We call this API after the consumer clicks on the advertiser ad.

200.description: Should redirect to the consumer partner
API will return all the click integrations setup for that partner

parameters.name: lead_type
parameters.description: Lead Type: 1 for Home, 2 for Life, 3 for Health, 6 for Auto, 7 for Medicare

request.description: what we sent to the partner

response_ms.description: Total response time (in ms) for the test

post.description: Ping phase. Serialize the request as JSON, excluding the PII, and HTTP POST this object to the ping endpoint.

200.description: Response code of 200 means the request was successful. However, it does not mean we have the accepted the ping. If we have the available buyers, we will respond with ping_id and a list of buyers. Those fields will not be present if we do not have any available buyers and you should not post us the lead.

post.description: Post phase. Serialize the request as JSON and HTTP POST this object to the post endpoint. PII data is required. Ping ID and bid IDs are required (returned via ping API). Exclusive posts will be attempted first, in order of decreasing bid. If any exclusive post is accepted, posting will stop. If no exclusive bids were accepted, shared posts will be attempted in parallel.

200.description: Response code of 200 means the request was successful. However, that does not mean we have accepted the lead. If the status is true that means the lead was accepted.

post.description: Ping phase. Serialize the request as JSON, excluding the PII, and HTTP POST this object to the ping endpoint.

200.description: Response code of 200 means the request was successful. However, it does not mean we have the accepted the ping. If we have the available buyers, we will respond with ping_id and a list of buyers. Those fields will not be present if we do not have any available buyers and you should not post us the call.

Response code of 200 means the request was successful. However, it does not mean we have the accepted the ping. If we have the available buyers, we will respond with ping_id and a list of buyers. Those fields will not be present if we do not have any available buyers and you should not post us the call.

post.description: Post phase. Serialize the request as JSON and HTTP POST this object to the post endpoint. PII data is required. Ping ID and bid IDs are required (returned via ping API). Exclusive posts will be attempted first, in order of decreasing bid. If any exclusive post is accepted, posting will stop. If no exclusive bids were accepted, shared posts will be attempted in parallel.

200.description: Response code of 200 means the request was successful. However, that does not mean we have accepted the lead. If the status is true that means the lead was accepted.

position.description: Integer value based on the actual position of the ad

aid.description: tracking info. Provided by SF team

cid.description: tracking info. Provided by SF team

zip.description: 5 digit zip code of the consumer

primary_phone.description: 10-digit phone number with no spaces or symbols. For example - 1112223333

email.description: Email address of the consumer

amount.description: Numeric value representing the amount of the claim

bodily_injury.description: Coverage limits in thousands; single injured limit/multiple injured limit E.g. 100/300

consent_list.description: List of advertisers for whom consent has been collected.

ping_id.description: ping ID returned from the ping phase. Only required on post phase.

aid.description: tracking info. Provided by SF team

cid.description: tracking info. Provided by SF team

sid.description: tracking info. Provided by SF team

session_id.description: tracking info. Provided by SF team

jornaya_lead_id.description: 36 character Jornaya LeadiD. Special value '1' can be passed on ping and only if actual LeadiD will be provided on post.

trusted_form_token.description: 40+ character Trusted Form Certificate ID (path portion of their URL). Special value '1' can be passed on ping and only if actual Trusted Form Certificate ID will be provided on post.

first_name.description: Applicant first name. Required only for post phase

last_name.description: Applicant last name. Required only for post phase

address.description: Applicant address. Required only for post phase

city.description: Applicant city. Required only for post phase

state.description: 2-character state code. Required only for post phase

zip.description: 5 digit zip code of the consumer. Required for both ping and post

primary_phone.description: 10-digit phone number with no spaces or symbols. Required only for post phase. For example - 1112223333

email.description: Email address of the consumer. Required only for post phase

years.description: Number of years at the current residence

amount.description: Numeric value representing the amount of the claim

expiration_date.description: mm/dd/yyyy. Required if currently_insured is true

coverage_years.description: Number of years covered. Required if currently_insured is true

bi_per_person.description: Bodily injury coverage limit per person

bi_per_incident.description: Bodily injury coverage limit per incident

call_consent.description: Indicates whether the user has consented to a call

sms_consent.description: Indicates whether the user has consented to SMS/MMS

email_consent.description: Indicates whether the user has consented to Email

consent_list.description: List of advertisers for whom consent has been collected.

ping_id.description: ping ID returned from the ping phase. Only required on post phase.

consent_list.description: List of advertisers for whom consent has been collected.

ping_id.description: ping ID returned from the ping phase. Only required on post phase.

aid.description: tracking info. Provided by SF team

cid.description: tracking info. Provided by SF team

jornaya_lead_id.description: 36 character Jornaya LeadiD. Special value '1' can be passed on ping and only if actual LeadiD will be provided on post.

trusted_form_token.description: 40+ character Trusted Form Certificate ID (path portion of their URL). Special value '1' can be passed on ping and only if actual Trusted Form Certificate ID will be provided on post.

zip.description: 5 digit zip code of the consumer

primary_phone.description: 10-digit phone number with no spaces or symbols. For example - 1112223333

email.description: Email address of the consumer

zip.description: 5 digit zip code of the home

call_consent.description: Indicates whether the user has consented to a call

sms_consent.description: Indicates whether the user has consented to SMS/MMS

email_consent.description: Indicates whether the user has consented to Email

consent_list.description: List of advertisers for whom consent has been collected.

ping_id.description: ping ID returned from the ping phase. Only required on post phase.

aid.description: tracking info. Provided by SF team

cid.description: tracking info. Provided by SF team

jornaya_lead_id.description: 36 character Jornaya LeadiD. Special value '1' can be passed on ping and only if actual LeadiD will be provided on post.

trusted_form_token.description: 40+ character Trusted Form Certificate ID (path portion of their URL). Special value '1' can be passed on ping and only if actual Trusted Form Certificate ID will be provided on post.

zip.description: 5 digit zip code of the consumer

primary_phone.description: 10-digit phone number with no spaces or symbols. For example - 1112223333

call_consent.description: Indicates whether the user has consented to a call

sms_consent.description: Indicates whether the user has consented to SMS/MMS

email_consent.description: Indicates whether the user has consented to Email

consent_list.description: List of advertisers for whom consent has been collected.

request_limit.description: Number of request according to request period. Skip this field for unlimited request.

request_period.description: Enter value in Seconds. Request Period is required when Request Limit is provided.

whitelisted_ips.description: Enter comma(,) separated list of IP addresses to whitelist.

project_id.description: Project_id field is required when first time create toke of an account/user.

request_limit.description: Number of request according to request period. Skip this field for unlimited request.

request_period.description: Enter value in Seconds. Request Period is required when Request Limit is provided.

whitelisted_ips.description: Enter comma(,) separated list of IP addresses to whitelist.

project_id.description: Project_id field is required when first time create toke of an account/user.
